name: Trevor Cross
goal: I believe that Europe and European nations should work together to harness and exploit the societal benefits and wealth creation  / employment potential arising from the growing field of Quantum Technologies.  In this way Europe can emerge as a leader in innovation and wealth creation as well as sustaining its more established leading position in Scientific discovery and development.  I have personally engaged myself in the professional societies and networking to achieve similar things in photonics and electronics at a National level in the UK.  This is broader than my interest that arises from my employment at e2v.
euInitiatives: The proposed Quantum Technology flagship program and related schemes supporting Quantum Technologies.
